description: Classic Italian veal marsala is hard to beat and easier than you would think to whip up, delicious served with potatoes or pasta.
name: Veal Marsala Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the flour on a plate and coat each escalope lightly. Heat half of the butter and oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook for 2 minutes on each side. Remove from the pan and set aside.

Heat the remaining butter and olive oil in the same pan and cook the onions and garlic for 5 minutes, add the mushrooms and cook for 5 minutes. Increase the heat to high, pour over the marsala and cook for 2-3 minutes until reduced by half.
Turn the heat back down, stir in the chicken stock and place the veal escalopes back in the sauce. Cook for 10 more minutes and serve immediately.
